body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
女主的设计10分我给11分，但剧情如果是单人纯爱就更好了

I like this doujin a lot because its one of the few that keeps the skirt till the end this is the type of doujin i like this should have a special tag upskirt. This is pretty good and her clothing is fashionable it makes things more hot. Plus the effort on keeping the dress was surely a challenge to draw because hentai artist tend to remove clothing at some point so it would be easier to draw but you kept it and thats a lot of effort. Listen I admire u a lot you should turn this into a series dont get discouraged if you have small views cuz with more effort you can become famous.
突然發現竟然可以留言了  我只想說 nunnu老師就是我們滴神!!! 嵌字君也請務必為老師做更多漢化哦哦
